title: Remove footer watermark branding

requirements.text: Remove the bottom-of-page watermark/branding from the application footer by deleting the “Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai” text and the caffeine.ai outbound link so it no longer appears on any page.

quotes: Can you remove the watermark at the bottom of the page

acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer displays any text or links referencing “caffeine.ai”.
No outbound link to https://caffeine.ai/ is present in the rendered footer DOM across all routes.
The footer still renders without layout breakage (e.g., copyright and other footer items remain aligned and readable).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components); compose them instead if needed.
Keep changes limited to removing the watermark/branding; do not introduce new authentication or complaint workflow behavior.
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire footer or landing page layout beyond removing the watermark text/link.
Changing backend code or data models.
